name: OneRoomGuild.org
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 37 "One Room"

A game about a retired hero, who runs a Modern Adventurer's Guild.

Controls
  • Move - WASD or Arrows
  • Interact - Enter
  • Exit Quest Board - Escape or Enter
How To Play
  • Assign Heroes to quests with the Quest Board.
  • Combine 2 Loot Items at the Workbench, to craft new equipment for your Heroes.
  • There are 8 Crafting Recipes in all. Each helps your heroes face their Quests.
  • Learn each Hero's strengths, and pick their Quests wisely.
  • Explore each area to unlock Trials and new Areas.
  • You must assign all 4 heroes to a Trial before they can attempt it.
Credits 
  • HitchH1k3r (@HitchH1k3r, hitchh1k3rsguide.com)
  • Day (Solifuge, @Dahold)
  • Tlyn (@TlynSolace)
  • Naali (@AlopexL)

BGM is an arrangement of the folksong "An Emigrant's Daughter".
